caption.title: Biomass of A. petiolata alone or in response to competition with other species in control (A) or soil with a history of A. petiolata (B).
caption.p: Biomass of A. petiolata alone versus in competition with members of different growth forms are shown in the insets. Statistically significant differences were determined using planned orthogonal 1-df contrasts, and are indicated with an asterisk.
